description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, John chose to play option 2.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 81.
Option 2 can yield a higher payoff if the other player chooses Option 1
Mutual cooperation splits the payoff evenly, while mutual defection reduces and splits it.
Asymmetric choices reward the defector (Option 2) and punish the cooperator (Option 1).
